bibl.title: Papyrology.
bibl.note: Datation au Ier siècle p.C. de: P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)); P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426); P. Oxy. LXIV, 4404; P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr. Inv. 1120 (= van Haelst 403); P. Ryl. III, 457 (= van Haelst 462). - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 47 (2000-2001) No. 28.
bibl.seg: Datation au Ier siècle p.C. de: P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)); P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426); P. Oxy. LXIV, 4404; P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr.
